translation.es: y mucho menos a cuatro o cinco.

translation.en: All of these things were going on at the same time.
translation.es: Todo esto sucedía al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: We were suspecting a bad outcome.
translation.es: Sospechábamos un feo desenlace.

translation.en: But we also knew that we didn't have any bodies.
translation.es: Pero no teníamos ningún cuerpo.

translation.en: Why are these people vanishing, never to be found or seen again?
translation.es: ¿Por qué desaparecen estas personas?

translation.en: Bodies never discovered.
translation.es: No se hallaron los cuerpos.

translation.en: You're scratching your head, you're going, What happened? They just vanished.
translation.es: Uno se pregunta qué pasó. Se los tragó la tierra.

translation.en: Never turned up. Where did they go?
translation.es: No aparecen. ¿Dónde están?

translation.en: You know, When does this end? What have we got here?
translation.es: Te preguntas: ¿Cuándo termina esto? ¿Con qué lidiamos aquí?.

translation.en: 'Cause truly, we didn't know.
translation.es: Realmente no lo sabíamos.

translation.en: The scary part was that his attorneys had run down to the federal court
translation.es: Lo aterrador fue que sus abogados habían ido al tribunal federal

translation.en: and applied for a federal injunction against the State's Attorney's office
translation.es: para solicitar una orden judicial contra la fiscalía

translation.en: and the Des Plaines Police Department.
translation.es: y la Policía de Des Plaines.

translation.en: Leroy Stevens, who was his civil lawyer for his company at the time, and I
translation.es: Leroy Stevens, que era su abogado civil en ese momento, y yo

translation.en: were in the midst of preparing a federal lawsuit
translation.es: estábamos preparando una demanda federal

translation.en: against the Des Plaines Police Department
translation.es: contra la Policía de Des Plaines

translation.en: um, to enjoin them from, uh, harassing Gacy.
translation.es: para impedir que acosaran a Gacy.

translation.en: And really ruining his business
translation.es: Estaban arruinando su negocio porque lo seguían muy de cerca

translation.en: because they were following him so closely and violating his civil rights.
translation.es: Estaban arruinando su negocio porque lo seguían muy de cerca y violaban sus derechos civiles.

translation.en: Terry Sullivan, who was the prosecutor, was playing it close to the vest.
translation.es: Terry Sullivan, el fiscal, era muy sigiloso.

translation.en: The police department was playing it close to the vest. We couldn't get information.
translation.es: El departamento de policía también. No obteníamos información.

translation.en: The only way we'd get to the bottom of it was file the lawsuit.
translation.es: Con la demanda, encontraríamos una explicación.

translation.en: If he gets that injunction approved, that's the end of it.
translation.es: Si se aprobaba la orden judicial, se terminaba todo.

translation.en: We'd have to back off altogether.
translation.es: No podríamos continuar.

translation.en: Can't interview him, his employees, nothing.
translation.es: No podríamos interrogarlo a él ni a los empleados.

translation.en: So yeah, time was of the essence. There's no question about it.
translation.es: Así que, sin duda, cada segundo contaba.

translation.en: You have to understand that, at the time,
translation.es: Deben entender que, en ese momento,

translation.en: Leroy and I really truly believed Gacy was innocent.
translation.es: Leroy y yo realmente creíamos que Gacy era inocente.

translation.en: Terry Sullivan eventually told me about the case that John had in Iowa,
translation.es: Terry Sullivan finalmente me contó sobre el antecedente de John en Iowa,

translation.en: which was a sodomy case, which, you know, I was shocked that he had that
translation.es: sobre la acusación de sodomía, y eso me sorprendió mucho.

translation.en: 'cause no… who expected Gacy, this guy who was the precinct captain,
translation.es: ¿Quién iba a suponer que Gacy, un delegado de distrito

translation.en: to have been convicted of sodomy? Nobody knew that.
translation.es: había sido condenado por sodomía? Nadie lo sabía.

translation.en: I was sentenced to Fort Madison, Iowa, which was a penitentiary,
translation.es: Me sentenciaron a la penitenciaría de Fort Madison, Iowa,

translation.en: but then they revised it and said
translation.es: pero lo revisaron y dijeron

translation.en: that since I was a first offender and I was still under 26,
translation.es: que, como era mi primer delito y tenía menos de 26 años,

translation.en: that I should be sent to the men's reformatory at Anamosa.
translation.es: debía ir al reformatorio de hombres de Anamosa.

translation.en: I was sent there. I was scared to death.
translation.es: Me enviaron allí. Estaba muerto de miedo.

translation.en: Again, never being arrested before,
translation.es: Nunca me habían arrestado,

translation.en: never being in jail before, didn't know what the hell…
translation.es: no sabía cómo era una cárcel.

translation.en: I thought I was gonna get killed in there.
translation.es: Creí que me iban a matar.

translation.en: ♪ O come let us adore him ♪ ♪ O come let us adore him ♪
translation.es: NAVIDAD EN ANAMOSA SEGMENTO ESPECIAL DE NOTICIAS DE 1969

translation.en: …I got into it and organized myself.
translation.es: Resulta que entré y me organicé.

translation.en: I went in there with a positive attitude.
translation.es: Entré con una actitud positiva.

translation.en: And, uh, I became not only popular, but powerful.
translation.es: Y no solo me volví popular, sino también poderoso.

translation.en: Hello, I'm John Gacy. I'm from Waterloo, Iowa.
translation.es: Hola. Soy John Gacy, de Waterloo, Iowa.

translation.en: And you're a man of some authority here. What's your title?
translation.es: Y usted es un hombre de cierta autoridad. ¿Cuál es su título?

translation.en: Well, I'm first cook in the kitchen,
translation.es: Soy primer cocinero en la cocina.

translation.en: and I run the, uh, the morning meal and the afternoon meal in the kitchen.
translation.es: Organizo la comida de la mañana y la de la tarde.

translation.en: Food was a… was an avenue of power
translation.es: La comida era una vía de poder.

translation.en: is… is I guess that's how I would describe it,
translation.es: La comida era una vía de poder. Supongo que así lo describiría, como una vía de poder.

translation.en: would be an avenue of power.
translation.es: Supongo que así lo describiría, como una vía de poder.

translation.en: And John used it relentlessly.
translation.es: Y John la usó implacablemente.

translation.en: Screw with John Gacy
translation.es: Si te metías con John Gacy,

translation.en: and you better start taking your meals somewhere else
translation.es: era mejor que empezaras a comer en otro lado

translation.en: because you had to assume that you're gonna get something like, for lack of a better description,
translation.es: porque tenías que asumir que habría, a falta de una mejor descripción,

translation.en: mouse turds in your… in your food the next time you come through
translation.es: excremento de ratón en tu comida la próxima vez

translation.en: because you didn't do what he said.
translation.es: por no haber seguido sus órdenes.

translation.en: Without force, I controlled the kitchen,
translation.es: Controlé la cocina sin violencia,

translation.en: and there was some 55 inmates in the kitchen.
translation.es: y había unos 55 reclusos allí.

translation.en: But I never yield to anybody.
translation.es: Porque yo nunca me rindo ante nadie.

translation.en: The other thing, of course, was the… the Jaycees,
translation.es: Otra cosa, por supuesto, fueron los Jaycees,

translation.en: and that's how I met him.
translation.es: y así fue como lo conocí.

translation.en: I'm sitting there reading or something,
translation.es: Estaba sentado leyendo o algo así,

translation.en: and he said, Hi, I'm John Gacy, and, uh, I'm recruiting for the Jaycees.
translation.es: y él dijo: Hola, soy John Gacy y estoy reclutando para los Jaycees.

translation.en: I didn't even know what the hell the Jaycees was at that point.
translation.es: Yo ni siquiera sabía qué diablos era eso.

translation.en: By halfway through the time that we were there,
translation.es: Pero a mediados de nuestra estadía allí,

translation.en: say toward the end of 1969,
translation.es: digamos que a fines de 1969,

translation.en: that was one of the largest Jaycee chapters in the entire state of Iowa,
translation.es: se dio uno de los mejores períodos de los Jaycees en todo el estado de Iowa,

translation.en: largely due to the recruiting efforts of John Gacy.
translation.es: en gran parte debido a las tareas de reclutamiento de John Gacy.

translation.en: …at the Anamosa Men's Reformatory.
translation.es: Me honraron como Hombre del Año en el Reformatorio de Hombres de Anamosa.

translation.en: I built the first miniature golf course inside the walls of a reformatory.
translation.es: Construí el primer campo de golf en miniatura en un reformatorio.

translation.en: This is an example of the man's abilities and talent.
translation.es: Este es un ejemplo de las habilidades y el talento de este hombre.

translation.en: I think you could make a case that there was a good John and a bad John.
translation.es: Podrías argumentar que había un John bueno y uno malo.

translation.en: I knew the good John.
translation.es: Yo conocí al bueno.

translation.en: I had glimpses of other things.
translation.es: Pude entrever otras cosas.

translation.en: The weak do not survive in prison.
translation.es: Los débiles no sobreviven en prisión.

translation.en: You either come under, uh, the ruling of… of some gang
translation.es: O caes bajo el poder de alguna pandilla

translation.en: or… or some other forceful inmate.
translation.es: o de algún otro recluso enérgico.

translation.en: You do what he says, otherwise you get the shit kicked out of you.
translation.es: Si no haces lo que él dice, te molerán a palos.

translation.en: Well, I would not bow to any of that shit
translation.es: Yo no me doblegaba ante nada similar

translation.en: because nobody will ever lead me.
translation.es: porque a mí nadie me manda.

translation.en: He was walking on the range that he lived in, over in the south house,
translation.es: Caminaba por su sector, en la parte sur,

translation.en: and he saw one inmate performing fellatio on another inmate in a cell,
translation.es: y vio a un recluso en una celda haciéndole una felación a otro.

translation.en: and just simply walked over, and kicked the guy in the face four times,
translation.es: Él simplemente se acercó y pateó al tipo en la cara cuatro veces

translation.en: and basically broke his jaw.
translation.es: y le rompió la mandíbula.

translation.en: He's struggling with his sexual urges toward homosexuals.
translation.es: Luchaba con sus impulsos sexuales hacia los homosexuales.

translation.en: That came out in his, in my opinion…
translation.es: En mi opinión,

translation.en: That came out in his personality as anger, as rage.
translation.es: eso lo expresaba como ira, como rabia.

translation.en: How long have you been here?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo lleva aquí?

translation.en: I've been here now a year and about two weeks.
translation.es: Un año y dos semanas aproximadamente.

translation.en: You mind my asking how long do you plan to take up residence here?
translation.es: ¿Le molesta que le pregunte cuánto tiempo va a estar aquí?

translation.en: Well, I hope to be getting out sometime in May.
translation.es: Espero salir en algún momento de mayo.

translation.en: Well, good. Yes. You gonna continue as a cook, use that as a profession, do you think?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Seguirá cocinando y hará de eso su profesión?

translation.en: Right. This is my profession before I came in.
translation.es: Sí. Esta ya era mi profesión antes de entrar.

translation.en: - All right. - Food service.
translation.es: - Bien. - La gastronomía.

translation.en: It was Christmastime.
translation.es: Se acercaba la Navidad.

translation.en: We were deeply involved in the Toys for Tots project.
translation.es: Estábamos muy involucrados en el proyecto de juguetes

translation.en: We were deeply involved with the Christmas banquet
translation.es: y en el banquete de Navidad

translation.en: for the Jaycees.
translation.es: para los Jaycees.

translation.en: A lot was going on.
translation.es: Pasaban muchas cosas.

translation.en: But then, John's…
translation.es: Y luego, el padre de John…

translation.en: …John's father died.
translation.es: murió.

translation.en: December 18th, my dad went in the hospital in Chicago
translation.es: El 18 de diciembre, mi papá fue al hospital

translation.en: and I was never told of it.
translation.es: y nunca me informaron.

translation.en: My dad died December 25th, Christmas Day.
translation.es: Mi papá murió el 25 de diciembre, en Navidad.

translation.en: They didn't tell me until after my dad was buried that he died.
translation.es: Me dijeron que había muerto cuando ya lo habían enterrado.

translation.en: Even after going to the joint for… for this sodomy conviction and all that,
translation.es: Incluso después de ir al reformatorio por la condena de sodomía,

translation.en: his father was still alive.
translation.es: su padre seguía vivo.

translation.en: John had the option at some point in time of trying to mend that fence.
translation.es: John tenía la opción de, eventualmente, tratar de hacer las paces.

translation.en: But not after that.
translation.es: Pero no después de eso.

translation.en: It was over. It was done.
translation.es: Se había terminado.

translation.en: I don't recall ever hearing him laugh very much after that.
translation.es: No recuerdo haberlo oído reír mucho después de eso.

translation.en: What I'm doing is just telling what my dad always told me, is I'm weak.
translation.es: Estoy diciendo lo que mi papá siempre me decía: que soy débil,

translation.en: Just a dumb, stupid kid. Can't do nothing.
translation.es: que soy un niño tonto y estúpido que no puede hacer nada.

translation.en: Yeah, he was right about a lot of things. I let him down when he died.
translation.es: Sí, tenía razón en muchas cosas. Lo decepcioné cuando murió.

translation.en: Most of the people who were serving ten- year sentences
translation.es: La mayoría de las personas que tenían condenas de diez años

translation.en: would serve around two years.
translation.es: cumplían solo dos años.

translation.en: But because of who we were and what we did inside,
translation.es: Debido a quiénes éramos y a lo que hicimos adentro,

translation.en: John and I got out in 18 months.
translation.es: John y yo salimos en 18 meses.

translation.en: So he and I basically left, uh, that, uh, second week in July,
translation.es: Él y yo nos fuimos esa segunda semana de julio,

translation.en: and, uh, we shook hands and walked away.
translation.es: nos dimos la mano y nos alejamos.

translation.en: By being with John everywhere all the time,
translation.es: Al seguir a John a todas partes constantemente,

translation.en: we were trying to break him down.
translation.es: buscábamos quebrarlo.

translation.en: I mean, I think that you can be the most law- abiding citizen in the entire world
translation.es: Aunque seas el ciudadano que más respete las leyes de todo el mundo,

translation.en: and you still would not want the police to be following you
translation.es: no te gustará que la policía te siga

translation.en: 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.es: las 24 horas del día, los siete días de la semana.

translation.en: As it went along and the investigators were interviewing Gacy contacts, Gacy's friends,
translation.es: A medida que los detectives interrogaban a los contactos y a los amigos de Gacy,

translation.en: I think some friends started realizing there's something more to this.
translation.es: algunos amigos empezaron notar que pasaba algo raro.

translation.en: I feel we were all that Gacy had left to talk to.
translation.es: Gacy solo nos tenía a nosotros para hablar.

translation.en: Nobody else wanted much to do with him.
translation.es: Nadie quería relacionarse con él.

translation.en: In some ways, I think John began to think that we were his best friends.
translation.es: Me parece que John empezó a creer que éramos sus mejores amigos.

translation.en: We weren't giving him a hard time, only following him.
translation.es: No lo estábamos torturando. Solamente lo seguíamos.

translation.en: Many times, he invited us in, trying to show what a nice guy he was
translation.es: Muchas veces, nos invitó a pasar para tratar de mostrar su amabilidad

translation.en: and how amiable he was with us, and it got us into the house.
translation.es: y lo simpático que era con nosotros, y así entramos a su casa.

translation.en: We had gotten a request from Lieutenant Kozenczak.
translation.es: Teníamos una solicitud del teniente Kozenczak.

translation.en: There were a missing TV and a missing radio from a missing person.
translation.es: Faltaban un televisor y una radio de una persona desaparecida.

translation.en: John Szyc's mother told us
translation.es: La madre de John Szyc nos dijo

translation.en: that a little TV that he had in his bedroom
translation.es: que el televisor que él tenía en su habitación

translation.en: was missing from his house.
translation.es: ya no estaba en su casa.

translation.en: She described it as a Motorola type TV,
translation.es: Lo describió como un televisor pequeño similar a un Motorola,

translation.en: and we recalled having seen a TV similar to that
translation.es: y recordábamos haber visto uno parecido

translation.en: when we went into Gacy's house during the search warrant.
translation.es: en la casa de Gacy cuando hicimos el allanamiento.

translation.en: So Bob Schultz said he had to use the restroom,
translation.es: Bob Schultz dijo que tenía que usar el baño

translation.en: which would get him into the other part of the house
translation.es: para ir a la otra parte de la casa

translation.en: where he could search.
translation.es: y poder buscarlo.

translation.en: My job became then to keep John entertained so he didn't go looking for Bob.
translation.es: Yo debía mantener entretenido a John para que no fuera a buscar a Bob.

translation.en: Bob looked around, couldn't find the TV.
translation.es: Bob echó un vistazo y no encontró el televisor.

translation.en: So he's in the bathroom,
translation.es: Estaba en el baño,

translation.en: flushin' the toilet like a good guy should.
translation.es: tirando de la cadena como todo tipo decente.

translation.en: But then, the heat kicked on.
translation.es: Luego, se encendió la calefacción.

translation.en: And that made all the difference in the world
translation.es: Y eso cambió absolutamente todo

translation.en: because Bob was right there by the heating duct, and this came up,
translation.es: porque Bob estaba junto al conducto de calefacción

translation.en: and he got a whiff of that like you wouldn't believe.
translation.es: y percibió un olor indescriptible.

translation.en: And right away, he thought, A putrid odor?
translation.es: Enseguida se preguntó si era un olor a putrefacción.

translation.en: Yes, it was.
translation.es: Y así era.

translation.en: We've been on the job for too long, we've handled too many dead bodies.
translation.es: Llevamos años en el trabajo, hemos manipulado muchos cadáveres.

translation.en: If he says that's what it was, you can take it to the bank.
translation.es: Si dice que huele a eso, dalo por hecho.

translation.en: Schultz recognized an odor that he knew was decomposing flesh.
translation.es: Schultz detectó un olor y sabía que era carne en descomposición.

translation.en: A body, a dead body.
translation.es: Un cuerpo, un cadáver.

translation.en: Anyway, he comes back at the end of his shift and tells me about the smell.
translation.es: Volvió al terminar su turno y me contó del olor.

translation.en: Well at the same time, I was hell- bent on trying to find a way
translation.es: Yo estaba empeñado en encontrar la manera

translation.en: to get underneath Gacy's skin
translation.es: de irritar a Gacy

translation.en: to… to make him lose his temper and slip up and make a mistake.
translation.es: para que perdiera los estribos y cometiera un error

translation.en: Say something, you know, that would be incriminating.
translation.es: o dijera algo incriminatorio.

translation.en: David Cram worked for him, for his company PDM.
translation.es: David Cram trabajaba para él en Contratistas P. D. M.

translation.en: I said, Let's get Cram back in here for an interview.
translation.es: Sugerí que lo citáramos para interrogarlo,

translation.en: Drag him back. Let's talk to him some more.
translation.es: para hablar un poco más con él.

translation.en: So, I'm talking to Cram, and I said to him,
translation.es: Estaba hablando con Cram y le pregunté

translation.en: Did you ever see Gacy completely lose his temper?
translation.es: si alguna vez había visto a Gacy perder los estribos.

translation.en: He says, Yeah. I say, What… what was the circumstance?
translation.es: Sí. Pregunté: ¿En qué circunstancias?.

translation.en: He says, Well, Gacy had me digging in the crawl space.
translation.es: Bueno, Gacy me hizo cavar en el sótano.

translation.en: And he says, I changed directions.
translation.es: Y yo cambié de dirección.

translation.en: Instead of going on a straight line, I went on a diagonal.
translation.es: En vez de ir en línea recta, fui en diagonal.

translation.en: Gacy came down to check on what I was doing, how I was digging.
translation.es: Gacy vino a ver cómo estaba cavando.

translation.en: He saw a diagonal instead of a straight line, he completely lost his temper.
translation.es: Vio una línea diagonal en vez de una recta y se puso como loco.

translation.en: Swearing, jumping up and down, hollering, screaming,
translation.es: Empezó a gritar y a maldecir.

translation.en: Goddamn it, I told you. I want you to dig here, not here.
translation.es: Me gritaba: 'Dije que cavaras aquí, no aquí'.

translation.en: And that's what got me thinking, the whole time we were doing this,
translation.es: Y eso me hizo reflexionar. Investigábamos para averiguar dónde estaban estas personas,

translation.en: we're trying to figure out where these people went.
translation.es: Investigábamos para averiguar dónde estaban estas personas,

translation.en: Where are they?
translation.es: su paradero.

translation.en: And, you know, in my wildest dreams, I say, It can't possibly be, but then you hear a story,
translation.es: Lo que piensas te parece una locura, pero escuchas una historia y dices:

translation.en: and then you go, Is it possible that there's somebody down there?
translation.es: ¿Es posible que haya alguien ahí abajo?.

translation.en: So I, that… with that, I had, um…
translation.es: Así que, en ese momento,

translation.en: my mission was…  …was to get Terry Sullivan to give us a second search warrant,
translation.es: mi misión era que Terry Sullivan nos diera una segunda orden de registro.

translation.en: which is not usual. Two search warrants on the same property.
translation.es: Pero no es común emitir dos órdenes para la misma propiedad.

translation.en: That was crazy. Come on. We gotta get this second search warrant.
translation.es: Estaba como loco. Necesitábamos otra orden.

translation.en: We need the second search warrant! Terry says, You can't.
translation.es: Se la pedí a Terry, y me dijo que era imposible.

translation.en: I said, We gotta… Figure it out! You're the lawyer!
translation.es: Dije: Resuélvelo, tú eres el abogado.

translation.en: What we needed during those days was evidence.
translation.es: En ese momento, lo que necesitábamos eran pruebas.

translation.en: We needed to hook the evidence onto Gacy so it wouldn't fall off.
translation.es: Necesitábamos pruebas incriminatorias para que no se cayera el caso.

translation.en: I came home after school to get something to eat before I went shopping.
translation.es: Vine a casa después de la escuela a comer algo antes de ir de compras.

translation.en: The phone rang, they asked me questions about the film slip.
translation.es: Sonó el teléfono y me preguntaron por el rollo fotográfico.

translation.en: The night that Rob went missing,
translation.es: La noche que Rob desapareció,

translation.en: I was, um, handing in some film to be processed at the pharmacy.
translation.es: yo estaba entregando un rollo fotográfico para que lo procesaran en la farmacia.

translation.en: And I filled out my envelope,
translation.es: Llené el sobre

translation.en: and I put it in the pack that was to be picked up.
translation.es: y lo puse en la pila que debía recogerse.

translation.en: And I tore off the receipt,
translation.es: Arranqué el recibo

translation.en: and then I put the receipt in the little trash box
translation.es: y lo puse en el pequeño cesto

translation.en: that was near the side of the cash register.
translation.es: que estaba al lado de la caja registradora.

translation.en: And then, um, I just kind of stopped.
translation.es: Luego, me detuve.

translation.en: And then, I stared at that receipt, and it stared back at me.
translation.es: Miré ese recibo y me devolvió la mirada.

translation.en: And for an unknown reason, I grabbed the receipt and I stuck it in Rob's jacket pocket.
translation.es: Por una razón que desconozco, lo metí en el bolsillo de la chaqueta de Rob.

translation.en: Thank God Kim Byers had put that little receipt
translation.es: Gracias a Dios, Kim Byers había puesto ese recibo

translation.en: into her pocket,
translation.es: en su bolsillo,

translation.en: which turns out to be Rob's coat.
translation.es: que resultó ser el bolsillo del abrigo de Rob.

translation.en: Those are those hunches, or intuitions, whatever you wanna call them.
translation.es: Esas son corazonadas o intuiciones, como quieras llamarlas,

translation.en: They drive us to do things that we're not sure why we do.
translation.es: que nos llevan a hacer cosas sin saber el porqué.

translation.en: I call them God whispers, where someone guides you to do something.
translation.es: Los llamo susurros de Dios, ya que alguien te guía para hacer algo.

translation.en: That receipt wound up in the trash at John Wayne Gacy's house.
translation.es: Ese recibo terminó en la basura de la casa de John Wayne Gacy.

translation.en: And that was our first connection putting Robert in that house.
translation.es: Fue nuestra primera prueba para poder ubicar a Robert en la casa.

translation.en: We had it sent out to the crime lab
translation.es: Lo enviamos al laboratorio de criminalística

translation.en: to see if they could match it up
translation.es: para ver si coincidía

translation.en: to the envelope of developed film.
translation.es: con el sobre del rollo revelado.

translation.en: And, in fact, there was a match,
translation.es: Y resultó que sí.

translation.en: exactly how it was torn off
translation.es: Se veía exactamente cómo lo habían arrancado,

translation.en: and the different little pieces and angles that were still in there.
translation.es: aún se veían los fragmentos y los ángulos del corte.

translation.en: Wow, it perfectly matched.
translation.es: Encajaba perfectamente.

translation.en: We were, of course, very happy 'cause that looks really good in court.
translation.es: Estábamos contentos porque eso es valioso en un tribunal.

translation.en: The receipt for the film from Kim Byers, plus the smell,
translation.es: El recibo del rollo de Kim Byers y el olor en la casa

translation.en: that was enough for Terry to say okay,
translation.es: bastaron para que Terry accediera

translation.en: and he drew up a second warrant.
translation.es: a emitir una segunda orden.

translation.en: We had a lot of heat on him at this time,
translation.es: INVESTIGACIÓN DE R. PIEST NOVENO DÍA Lo teníamos muy presionado

translation.en: and we could tell from John's deportment that he could feel the pressure too.
translation.es: y, por el comportamiento de John, notábamos que él sentía esa presión.

translation.en: The net was kind of closing in on him.
translation.es: Estaban a punto de atraparlo.

translation.en: The web was closing in on him at the time.
translation.es: Estaban cada vez más cerca.

translation.en: His cat and mouse game was coming to an end.
translation.es: El juego estaba por terminar.

translation.en: I think we started noticing that something was happening to him,
translation.es: Empezamos a notar que algo le estaba pasando,

translation.en: which eventually did.
translation.es: y así fue.

translation.en: He finally just kinda went off the rails a little bit.
translation.es: Finalmente se descontroló un poco.

translation.en: John Gacy called me, wanted to get together
translation.es: John Gacy me llamó para que nos reuniéramos

translation.en: because he told me that he had something new to tell me and Leroy Stevens.
translation.es: porque tenía algo nuevo que decirnos a mí y a Leroy Stevens.

translation.en: And I told him, John, if it's something new, fine.
translation.es: Le dije: John, si es algo nuevo, está bien.

translation.en: Otherwise, I don't wanna hear the same old bullshit from you.
translation.es: Pero no quiero oír la misma basura de siempre.

translation.en: Rationally and understandably,
translation.es: Racional y comprensiblemente,

translation.en: I went over to talk to Sam about the harassment,
translation.es: fui a hablar con Sam sobre el acoso policial,

translation.en: not of me,
translation.es: no hacia mí,

translation.en: but why they were harassing my employees.
translation.es: sino hacia mis empleados.

translation.en: Why was I defending them?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los defendía?

translation.en: Was I afraid they were gonna say something about what I was doing?
translation.es: ¿Tenía miedo de que dijeran algo sobre lo que estaba haciendo?

translation.en: He came and told me the same old story,
translation.es: Me dijo lo mismo de siempre.

translation.en: vehemently denying anything to do with this kid.
translation.es: Negaba haber tenido algo que ver con Piest.

translation.en: I… I didn't believe him anymore. I really did not believe him.
translation.es: La verdad es que yo ya no le creía.

translation.en: I had a picture of Robbie Piest
translation.es: Tenía una foto de Robbie Piest

translation.en: that was on the front page of the Daily Herald,
translation.es: en la portada del Daily Herald,

translation.en: the suburban news daily out there.
translation.es: que era el periódico de la zona.

translation.en: I started pounding on the table. I said… I said, Look at this, Gacy! Look at this, John!
translation.es: Empecé a golpear la mesa y grité: ¡Mira esto, John!

translation.en: This kid is missing! They think you did it!
translation.es: Este chico está desaparecido. ¡Sospechan de ti!

translation.en: Stop lying to me!
translation.es: ¡Deja de mentirme!.

translation.en: I yelled at him like that. I pounded the thing.
translation.es: Le grité así y golpeé la mesa.

translation.en: And he got very sheepish, and he said, Do you have anything to drink here?
translation.es: Se avergonzó y me preguntó si tenía algo para beber.

translation.en: I poured a little vino for me, a little bit for Gacy, little bit for Stevens.
translation.es: Serví un poco de vino para mí, para Gacy y para Stevens.

translation.en: We each drank a shot of it.
translation.es: Los tres bebimos un trago.

translation.en: And Gacy said, Fill up my cup.
translation.es: Gacy dijo: Lléname la copa.

translation.en: And I filled his cup up,
translation.es: Le llené la copa

translation.en: and he just chugged it down, chugged it down.
translation.es: y se bebió todo de un trago.

translation.en: He looks at the picture of Robbie Piest, he goes, um…
translation.es: Miró la fotografía de Robbie Piest y dijo:

translation.en: This boy is dead. Just like that.
translation.es: Este chico está muerto. Así como así.

translation.en: My heart… My heart start… boom- boom… started pounding.
translation.es: El corazón me empezó a latir con fuerza.

translation.en: It was just…
translation.es: Y le dije:

translation.en: I'm like, What? What am I getting into here?
translation.es: ¿Cómo? ¿En qué me estoy metiendo?.

translation.en: Then he says… And Leroy and I are just sitting here watching him, and he goes,
translation.es: Leroy y yo estábamos sentados mirándolo, y él dijo:

translation.en: I've been a judge, jury, and executioner of many, many people.
translation.es: He juzgado y castigado a muchas personas.

translation.en: Now I wanna be my own judge, jury, and executioner. I wanna tell you everything that happened.
translation.es: Ahora me juzgaré y castigaré a mí. Quiero contarles todo lo que pasó.

translation.en: I aged many, many years during that night, uh,
translation.es: Envejecí muchos años esa noche,

translation.en: both as a lawyer, uh, and as a person.
translation.es: como abogado y como persona.

translation.en: It was one of the scariest nights of my life.
translation.es: Fue una de las noches más aterradoras que viví.

translation.en: My heart was pounding out of my chest the rest of the night,
translation.es: El corazón me latió con fuerza toda la noche,

translation.en: s- smoking one cigarette after another one.
translation.es: y fumaba un cigarrillo tras otro.

translation.en: Leroy was smoking. He turned…
translation.es: Leroy también.

translation.en: He… he lit his cigarettes backwards. The filter was on the wrong end.
translation.es: Encendió un cigarrillo al revés. Tenía el filtro del otro lado.

translation.en: And after he told us all this…
translation.es: Después de que nos contó todo…

translation.en: he, um… he fell asleep.
translation.es: se quedó dormido.

translation.en: I don't remember exactly what happened.
translation.es: No recuerdo exactamente qué pasó.

translation.en: I can remember I went to Sam's office,
translation.es: Fui al despacho de Sam,

translation.en: but I did not go to Sam's office to tell him all that shit.
translation.es: pero no fui para contarle toda esa mierda.

translation.en: Evidently, when I got there…
translation.es: Evidentemente, cuando llegué…

translation.en: something else took over and some other conversation come up.
translation.es: alguien más tomó el control y surgió otra conversación.

translation.en: It was a horrible, professional, ethical spot for me as a young lawyer.
translation.es: Era una situación espantosa para un abogado joven.

translation.en: I was 30 years old.
translation.es: Yo tenía 30 años.

translation.en: And, uh, Leroy, you know, we had to figure…
translation.es: Y para Leroy. Debíamos descifrar…

translation.en: The best thing to do is get him to a psychiatrist, have him committed,
translation.es: Lo mejor era que un psiquiatra lo viera y lo internara

translation.en: and then figure out what to do with this guy.
translation.es: para luego decidir qué hacer con él.

translation.en: So we set up an appointment
translation.es: Hicimos una cita

translation.en: for, like, eight o'cl… eight, nine o'clock in the morning with the psychiatrist we found during the night.
translation.es: para las ocho o nueve de la mañana con el psiquiatra que hallamos esa noche.

translation.en: My partner and I started that night
translation.es: Con mi colega, esa noche empezamos

translation.en: at Gacy's attorney, Sam Amirante's, office in Park Ridge, downtown Park Ridge.
translation.es: en el despacho del abogado de Gacy, Sam Amirante, en el centro de Park Ridge.

translation.en: So just as I got to the building,
translation.es: Justo cuando llegamos al edificio,

translation.en: Sam Amirante and his other attorney, Leroy Stevens,
translation.es: Sam Amirante y su otro abogado, Leroy Stevens,

translation.en: were coming out of his office
translation.es: salían de la oficina

translation.en: and into the vestibule, the whole building there,
translation.es: y estaban llegando al vestíbulo del edificio.

translation.en: and they invited us in.
translation.es: Nos hicieron pasar.

translation.en: And they couldn't be nice enough to us. They cou…
translation.es: Y fueron muy amables.

translation.en: You want a bottle of booze? Want anything to eat? Um…
translation.es: Nos ofrecieron algo de beber y de comer.

translation.en: Whatever you want, we'll get for you. You can't let Gacy go.
translation.es: Lo que nosotros quisiéramos. Dijeron: No dejen ir a Gacy.

translation.en: If he tries to leave,
translation.es: Si intenta huir, dispárenle a los neumáticos.

translation.en: you gotta shoot his tires out, and don't let him leave.
translation.es: Si intenta huir, dispárenle a los neumáticos. No pueden permitir que se vaya.

translation.en: You can't let him leave.
translation.es: No pueden permitir que se vaya.

translation.en: Finally, we said, Sam, we're not gonna shoot somebody's tires out.
translation.es: Respondimos: Sam, no le dispararemos a ningún neumático.

translation.en: Unless, why? Why should we be taking this kind of activity?
translation.es: A menos que… ¿Por qué deberíamos hacer algo así?.

translation.en: Just do what you can. I can't tell you now, but you… you can't let him go.
translation.es: Hagan lo que puedan. No puedo hablar, pero no lo dejen ir.

translation.en: About six in the morning, it started to get light.
translation.es: A las seis de la mañana, empezó a amanecer.

translation.en: Gacy starts waking up. He goes, What am I doing here? You know…
translation.es: Gacy se despertó y dijo: ¿Qué hago aquí?

translation.en: What… I got things to do. I got places to go today. I'm… I'm really busy.
translation.es: Tengo cosas que hacer y lugares a los que ir. Estoy ocupado.

translation.en: I said, John, you told me everything. You were here all night.
translation.es: Le dije: Me contaste todo. Pasaste la noche aquí.

translation.en: Leroy and I, you talked to us, you told us the whole thing.
translation.es: Nos contaste todo a Leroy y a mí.

translation.en: Well, I can't talk about that. I got places to go, things to do. I'm outta here. Pew…
translation.es: No puedo hablar de eso ahora. Tengo cosas que hacer. Me voy.

translation.en: Takes off.
translation.es: Y se fue.
